name: cement production, Pozzolana Portland | hard coal ash | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/19821/documentation

The total installed capacity of cement in india during the year 2014-15 is 390 million tonnes. Total cement production during same year was 270.93 million tonnes. As per the goverment statistics cement industry grew at 5.6% in 2014-15. Cement industry is likely to grow in coming years due to various initiative of goverment of India like National highway project, 100 smart city, housing for all etc. Indian cement plant are most energy efficienct in the word.There thermal and electrical energy consumption is lower than the word. In India, various types of cements are manufactured like ordinary portland cement, pozzolana portland cement, portland slag cement, white cement etc. Pozzolana portland cement manufactured by mixing and grinding of clinker, flyash and gypsum in certain proportion.

Activity starts from clinker storage in Silo. It includes Clinker and additives blending and grinding in cement mill, internal transportation etc.

This activity ends with the cement produced in the cement mill. The dataset does not include packaging and administration.
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2394:Manufacture of cement, lime and plaster

processDocumentation.timeDescription: For this activity time period of 2014 to 2017 has been considered . As during this period many cement plants are adding flyash more than 15%. Maximum flyash addition in cement plant was reported as 33%. Also during this period Indian cement industry has done significant works in improving energy efficiency by installing energy efficient equipment, process optimization, equipment retrofit etc.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data represents for all geographical locations where cement has been manufactured in India.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: For this activity latest available technologies were considered like Vertical roller mill, energy efficient fans etc.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Data represents for 60% of the total installed cement capacity in the year of 2014-15.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: For this activity sample questionnaire has been prepared and circulated to all cement manufacturing units in India. Here we have selected clusterwise approch for collecting the data. Due to clusterwise approch variation in quality of raw material , different technologies etc. has taken care. After receiving the data from plants same has been analysed for any discripancies. Extreme minimum and maximum values reported by plants were removed. Final numbers were checked with cement industry expert.

exchanges.description: Primary data collected from 20 cement manufacturing units. The value has been calculated as a weighted average with respect to production volume.
